item.title: Mauritius Summer Holidays 2025 - Three Weeks of Family, Legacy, and New Beginnings
item.description:
I spent three unforgettable weeks in Mauritius during July-August 2025. This trip was special in so many ways - it was about honoring family legacy, building new opportunities, and celebrating the people who matter most.

1. Baptism of Laxmi Villa - A Dream Reborn

Estelle and I completed the renovation of Laxmi Villa, the house Dad and Ma built in 1999 after I left Mauritius. The three-floor structure has always held meaning for our family:

item.title: Too Young to Die
item.description:
A poem for my brother. Reflecting on life, family, and the passage of time.

In Remembrance

Memorial and Remembrance for Ranjiv

Too Young to Die

Once I was four years old, i told my mama “Pretty woman walking down the streah haha” Then she shouted at me and i said mama “You ugly woman, yacking down the stream yah”

That was then and the world was smaller And everything was so simpler and life was gentler My brother and I were running down the roads in Sodnac Drinking our dad’s secret stash of cognac
